description:
Legendary rap group The Dirty Dawg could have taken Japan by storm, but then they broke up. Now each member fights in one of the four rival groups. Battles for turf are fought with rap and the Hypnosis Mic, a microphone that can affect the human spirit.
Source: crunchyroll
Note: The first episode received an advance screening on Abema TV on September 23, 2023. The regular TV broadcast started on October 7, 2023.

REGULAR.description:
Just after the second division battle ends, a string of ordinary citizens go on the rampage. On top of that, there`s a hostage situation at a hotel in Ikebukuro. The objective: revenge against the Buster Bros!!! Ichiro, Jiro, and Saburo dash to the scene!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Cold.
Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Cold.
Revenge is a dish best served cold.

REGULAR.description:
The Katen-gumi is attacked. When Samatoki Aohitsugi, Jyuto Iruma, and Rio Mason Busujima arrive to help, they meet self-proclaimed "legendary gambler" Chuji Furoito. Meanwhile, MAD TRIGGER CREW has its hands full with the civilian rampages.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Side with the Weak and Crush the Strong.
Side with the Weak and Crush the Strong.
Side with the weak and crush the strong.

REGULAR.description:
Samatoki recognizes TBH`s dancers. Bad things will happen if they aren`t stopped, so MAD TRIGGER CREW joins forces with Ichiro Yamada, Ramuda Amemura, and Jakurai Jinguji. Elsewhere, bad things are happening around Nagoya Division`s Bad Ass Temple.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Happiness Depends Upon Ourselves.
Happiness Depends Upon Ourselves.
Happiness depends upon ourselves.

REGULAR.description:
A huge man named Ondoriya challenges Sasara Nurude, Rosho Tsutsujimori, and Rei Amayado—Osaka Division`s Dotsuitare Honpo—to a rap battle. An accident during the battle causes Ondoriya to lose his memory. Sasara and Rosho try to help him get it back!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There Is Little Success Where There Is Little Laughter.
There Is Little Success Where There Is Little Laughter.
There is little success where there is little laughter.

REGULAR.description:
Jakurai goes to Nagoya to look for clues about TBH and runs into Hifumi and Doppo. Hifumi is working at the Nagoya branch of the host club. When they hear that club patrons have info on TBH, Jakurai, Ichiro, Kuko, and the others go help out at the club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As Soon as You Trust Yourself, You Will Know How to Live.
As Soon as You Trust Yourself, You Will Know How to Live.
As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.

REGULAR.description:
MAD TRIGGER CREW and Fling Posse learn that there are clues about TBH in Osaka. They ask Dotsuitare Honpo for help and start gathering information. A crew of three imitating Fling Posse appears. Something about seeing a copy of himself irritates Ramuda.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friendship Is a Single Soul Dwelling in Three Bodies.
Friendship Is a Single Soul Dwelling in Three Bodies.
Friendship is a single soul dwelling in three bodies.

REGULAR.description:
Ichiro and the others head to Osaka Bay to dismantle the bombs at the theme park where TBH announces that they`re holding an Underground Division Rap Battle. The crews split into three groups to cover three areas, then assassins appear to block their way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hell Is Empty and All the Devils Are Here.
Hell Is Empty and All the Devils Are Here.
Hell is empty and all the devils are here.

REGULAR.description:
MAD TRIGGER CREW and Dotsuitare Honpo arrive in a new area and fall into TBH`s trap. The two teams are shown footage of Samatoki`s younger sister, Rosho`s student, and Rio`s former commanding officer. Only one can be saved. Who will the teams choose?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Each of Us Bears His Own Hell.
Each of Us Bears His Own Hell.
Each of us bears his own Hell.

REGULAR.description:
TBH dancers Kiaro and Skuro appear before Ichiro and Kuko. Ichiro says that he`s sure they`re people he used to know, but the dancers don`t remember it. Meanwhile, when Matenro and Fling Posse arrive in their arena, they`re ambushed by assassins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The North Wind and the Sun.
The North Wind and the Sun.
The North Wind and the Sun.

REGULAR.description:
TBH appears again before Ichiro and the others. They say that if they`re beaten in a rap battle, they`ll spill everything they know. Ichiro, Samatoki, Ramuda, Jakurai, Kuko, and Sasara accept the challenge. After the battle, the mastermind is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Every New Beginning Comes from Some Other Beginning`s End.
Every New Beginning Comes from Some Other Beginning`s End.
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning`s end.

REGULAR.description:
Everyone who fell into Kaibyakumon`s trap divide into groups and head out via three helicopters. Ichiro and the others agree to help suppress the rioters in Tokyo. The six members in the third helicopter head to Shibuya to confront Chiaro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There Are No Goodbyes for Us. Wherever You Are, You Will Always Be in My Heart.
There Are No Goodbyes for Us. Wherever You Are, You Will Always Be in My Heart.
There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.

REGULAR.description:
The six leaders arrive in Chuuoku where the special forces have started rioting due to the influence of Kaibyakumon`s drones. The second helicopter lands in Shinjuku where they start looking for the drones` control server, but they fall into Scuro`s trap.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tears Come from the Heart and Not from the Brain.
Tears Come from the Heart and Not from the Brain.
Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.

REGULAR.description:
The six leaders head to the former site of Beginning Gate where they find Kaibyakumon waiting for them. Kaibyakumon transforms into a monster using hundreds of drones and overwhelms the six leaders with a rap overflowing with rage and despair.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Where There`s Hope, There`s Life. It Fills Us with Fresh Courage and Makes Us Strong Again.
Where There`s Hope, There`s Life. It Fills Us with Fresh Courage and Makes Us Strong Again.
Where there`s hope, there`s life. It fills us with fresh courage and makes us strong again.
Hypnosis Mic: Division Rap Battle - Rhyme Anima +
Hypnosismic: Division Rap Battle - Rhyme Anima Plus
ヒプノシスマイク -Division Rap Battle- Rhyme Anima +
HypMic s2
